title: Bill Roth returns as play-by-play voice for Virginia Tech Football - VT hokiesports.com
content: Bill Roth returns as play-by-play voice for Virginia Tech Football  VT hokiesports.com
description: Virginia Tech Athletics and LEARFIELD, the Hokies' multimedia rights partner, announced Friday the return of Bill Roth as the play-by-play announcer for Virginia Tech Football, a role he previously held for 27 seasons.
